member.name: T:WindowsHookLib.MouseHook
member.summary: Provides functionality to hook the mouse system wide (low level).

member.summary: Required designer variable.

member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.

member.name: M:WindowsHookLib.MouseHook.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:WindowsHookLib.MouseHook.InstallHook
member.summary: Installs the mouse hook for this application.

member.name: M:WindowsHookLib.MouseHook.RemoveHook
member.summary: Removes the mouse hook for this application.

member.name: M:WindowsHookLib.MouseHook.SafeRemove
member.summary: Safely removes the hook without throwing exception.

member.name: M:WindowsHookLib.MouseHook.GetMouseDownArgs(WindowsHookLib.UnsafeNativeMethods.MouseInfo,System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons)
member.summary: Sets the mouse down data for the MouseEventArgs object and calls OnMouseDown method to raise the mouse down event.
member.param: A MouseData structure object that contains the data for the mouse down event.
A mouse button that is down.

member.name: M:WindowsHookLib.MouseHook.GetMouseUpArgs(WindowsHookLib.UnsafeNativeMethods.MouseInfo,System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons)
member.summary: Sets the mouse up data for the MouseEventArgs object and calls OnMouseUp method to raise the mouse up event.
member.param: A MouseData structure object that contains the data for the mouse up event.
A mouse button that is up.

member.name: M:WindowsHookLib.MouseHook.OnMouseClick(WindowsHookLib.UnsafeNativeMethods.MouseInfo,System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons)
member.summary: Checks the mouse up data and calls OnMouseclick or OnMouseDoubleClick events.
member.param: A MouseData structure object that contains the data for the mouse up event.
A mouse button that is up.

member.name: M:WindowsHookLib.MouseHook.SynthesizeMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons)
member.summary: Synthesizes a mouse down event system wide.
member.param: A Windows.Forms.MouseButton that should be down.

member.name: M:WindowsHookLib.MouseHook.SynthesizeMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Synthesizes a mouse down event system wide.
member.param: A Windows.Forms.MouseButton that should be down.
Specifies an additional value associated with the mouse event.

member.name: M:WindowsHookLib.MouseHook.SynthesizeMouseUp(System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons)
member.summary: Synthesizes a mouse up event system wide.
member.param: A Windows.Forms.MouseButton that should be up.

member.name: M:WindowsHookLib.MouseHook.SynthesizeMouseUp(System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Synthesizes a mouse up event system wide.
member.param: A Windows.Forms.MouseButton that should be up.
Specifies an additional value associated with the mouse event.

member.name: M:WindowsHookLib.MouseHook.SynthesizeMouseWheel(System.Int32)
member.summary: Synthesizes a mouse wheel event system wide.
member.param: A positive value indicates that the wheel was rotated forward, away from the user; a negative value indicates that the wheel was rotated backward, toward the user. One wheel click is defined as wheel delta, which is 120.

member.name: M:WindowsHookLib.MouseHook.SynthesizeMouseWheel(System.Int32,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Synthesizes a mouse wheel event system wide.
member.param: A positive value indicates that the wheel was rotated forward, away from the user; a negative value indicates that the wheel was rotated backward, toward the user. One wheel click is defined as wheel delta, which is 120.
Specifies an additional value associated with the mouse event.

member.name: M:WindowsHookLib.MouseHook.SynthesizeMouseMove(System.Drawing.Point,WindowsHookLib.MapOn)
member.summary: Synthesizes a mouse move event system wide.
member.param: A screen location where the mouse should be moved.
Specifies where the mouse coordinates should be mapped.

member.name: M:WindowsHookLib.MouseHook.SynthesizeMouseMove(System.Drawing.Point,WindowsHookLib.MapOn,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Synthesizes a mouse move event system wide.
member.param: A screen location where the mouse should be moved.
Specifies where the mouse coordinates should be mapped.
Specifies an additional value associated with the mouse event.

member.summary: Default constructor.

member.param: The exception message.

member.param: The exception message.
The inner exception.

member.param: The exception message.

member.name: T:WindowsHookLib.HookState
member.summary: Specifies constants that define the state of the hook.

member.summary: The unistalled state.

member.name: F:WindowsHookLib.HookState.Installed
member.summary: The installed state.

member.name: T:WindowsHookLib.StateChangedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the WindowsHookLib.MouseHook.StateChanged, WindowsHookLib.KeyboardHook.StateChanged and WindowsHookLib.ClipboardHook.StateChanged events.

member.name: M:WindowsHookLib.StateChangedEventArgs.#ctor(WindowsHookLib.HookState)
member.param: A WindowsHookLib.HookState enumeration value representing the state of the hook.

member.name: P:WindowsHookLib.StateChangedEventArgs.State
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the hook is installed.

member.name: T:WindowsHookLib.MapOn
member.summary: Represents mouse coordinate mapping enumatation.

member.name: F:WindowsHookLib.MapOn.Relative
member.summary: Maps the mouse coordinates relative to the previous mouse event (the last reported position). Positive values mean the mouse moved right (or down); negative values mean the mouse moved left (or up).

member.name: F:WindowsHookLib.MapOn.PrimaryMonitor
member.summary: Maps the absolute coordinates of the mouse on the screen. In a multimonitor system, the coordinates map to the primary monitor.

member.name: F:WindowsHookLib.MapOn.VirtualDesktop
member.summary: Maps the mouse coordinates to the entire virtual desktop (multimonitor system).

member.name: T:WindowsHookLib.MouseEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the WindowsHookLib.MouseHook.MouseDown, WindowsHookLib.MouseHook.MouseUp, WindowsHookLib.MouseHook.MouseMove and WindowsHookLib.MouseHook.MouseWheel events.

member.name: M:WindowsHookLib.MouseEventArgs.#ctor(System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons,System.Int32,System.Drawing.Point,System.Int32)
member.param: One of the System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons values indicating which mouse button was pressed.
The number of times a mouse button was pressed.
The coordinate point of a mouse click, in pixels.
A signed count of the number of detents the wheel has rotated.

member.name: P:WindowsHookLib.MouseEventArgs.Handled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the event was handled.

member.name: T:WindowsHookLib.KeyboardEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the WindowsHookLib.KeyboardHook.KeyDown and WindowsHookLib.KeyboardHook.KeyUp events.

member.name: M:WindowsHookLib.KeyboardEventArgs.#ctor(System.Windows.Forms.Keys,System.Windows.Forms.Keys)
member.param: A System.Windows.Forms.Keys representing the key that was pressed, combined with any modifier flags that indicate which CTRL, SHIFT, and ALT keys were pressed at the same time. Possible values are obtained by applying bitwise OR (|) operator to constants from the System.Windows.Forms.Keys enumeration.
The virtual key code.

member.name: P:WindowsHookLib.KeyboardEventArgs.SuppressKeyPress
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the event was handled.

member.name: P:WindowsHookLib.KeyboardEventArgs.VirtualKeyCode
member.summary: Gets the virtual key code for a KeyDown or KeyUp event.
